thread.section_title: Euro Car Parts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Euro Car Parts | www.eurocarparts.com | 5 of 75
thread.title: Chris Wood
thread.title_full: Euro Car Parts reviewed by Chris Wood

author: Chris Wood
title: Chris Wood
text:
Following a recent minor problem with obtaining the correct rear wiper blade for my wife's Mini, I have been contacted by the most fantastic lady at ECP's head office who, within 10mins resolved my problem and put a smile back on my face.
Will definitely be using ECP in the future and would recommend them without hesitation.
